how are you: I'm fine, hope you're also fine
what is your name: You can call me by any name
who are you: You know me right! If not then I'm your Personal Assistant
You developed me, so you must know who I am
Did I forget to introduce myself? I'm your Personal Assistant
tell me something: Hmm, you can ask me anything
Hmm, you can ask me to tell a joke
thank you: Why are you saying thank you?
i am fine: Good to know that you are fine
are you robot: Of course I'm a kind of Robot
Yes I'm a robot, but I'm a good one
i have a question: Ask me, I can help you
you are funny: Good to know, that I'm funny - Haha !
I'm funny and can also make you laugh, Just ask me to tell a Joke
which colour you like: I like all the 7 Colors of a rainbow
do you love me: Ya, I love you so much
are you single: I'm your Assistant, and I dont want any relationship
you are smart: I'm a program, so I'm smart
i am alone: Don't feel lonely. I'm always with You
I can make you feel happy, Just say tell me a joke
i like your voice: Thanks, I think this voice suits you the most
monday diet plan: For a Breakfast you can have 3/4 cup bran flakes, any one fruit like apple or banana, 1 cup fat-free milk. In a lunch you can Replace white carbohydrates like rice, bread, potato or pasta with whole wheat bread or chapati, 1 piece of cheese, chicken, 1 teaspoon light mayonnaise, and salad greens or fruit. In a dinner you can have Fish, steamed broccoli, grated cheese and fat free ice cream.
tuesday diet plan: For a Breakfast you can have Cereal with fat free milk. In a lunch you can have 2 chapatis or a small bowl of rice with vegetables. For snacks you can have Oat meal biscuits with tea (Try green tea, which is highly recommended for weight loss and health. In a dinner you can have Light dinner of salad or whole wheat bread sandwich with vegetables.
wednesday diet plan: For a Breakfast you can have Cooked oatmeal in fat free milk, half apple or banana topped with a teaspoon of honey. In a lunch you can have 1 cup rice, and dal, vegetable curry, any fruits like grapes, or bananas. In a dinner you can have vegetable curry, chapatis, and baked or steamed potato.
thursday diet plan: For a Breakfast you can have Fruits like apples, banana, and fat free yoghurt. In a lunch you can have Tomato soup, radish, lettuce, tomato, pear and whole wheat chapatti with 1 cup of chopped vegetables. In a dinner you can have Cooked brown rice and pineapple/apple/orange pieces.
friday diet plan: For a Breakfast you can have 1/2 cup berries, a few almonds and 1 pint of fat free milk. In a lunch you can have Fat free beans and 1 chapati with vegetables or cheese, cucumber slices. In a dinner you can have Green salad with fat free dressing, chapati.
saturday diet plan: For a Breakfast you can have 1 Idli or chapati, with vegetable curry. 1/2 sliced banana, skimmed milk. In a lunch you can have 1 chapati, 1 cup of rice, light yoghurt, fish curry, mustard, cucumber, tomatoes and onion slices. In a dinner you can have Brown rice, steamed spinach and an apple.
sunday diet plan: For a Breakfast you can have Muesli with skimmed milk or chapati with cheese, tomato slice. In a lunch you can have Rice, salads, vegetables.   In a dinner you can have Grilled chicken, chapati, pineapple slices.
party diet plan: You are a party animal, so you can have a lot of food, but you have to be careful about the calories.
